IntroSubTitle: Declarative Abstractions for Assembling Web UI's from Components (Structure Html + Data Json + Action Json) defined in html/json files across web frontend/backend boundries!

IntroList.InfoIcon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='height:60px' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='M11 3.055A9.001 9.001 0 1020.945 13H11V3.055z' /><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='M20.488 9H15V3.512A9.025 9.025 0 0120.488 9z' /></svg>
IntroList.InfoInfo: Splitting Web UI development into two steps, namely building and assembling  helps increase productivity, reduces cognitive load and enables consumers to maintain software under controlled guidance

IntroList.InfoIcon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='height:60px' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='M15 12a3 3 0 11-6 0 3 3 0 016 0z' /><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='M2.458 12C3.732 7.943 7.523 5 12 5c4.478 0 8.268 2.943 9.542 7-1.274 4.057-5.064 7-9.542 7-4.477 0-8.268-2.943-9.542-7z' /></svg>
IntroList.InfoInfo: Introspection can identify the json data source of components across global, context, parent hierarchy and component data used to render a component view

IntroList.InfoIcon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='height:60px' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z' /></svg>
IntroList.InfoInfo: Declarative Abstractions for Assembling Static UI (Html) Components using mustache syntax for composing Html Components and for placeholder components to facilitate assembly

IntroList.InfoIcon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='height:60px' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z' /></svg>
IntroList.InfoInfo: Declarative Abstractions for Assembling Static Data UI (Html + Json) Components using mustache syntax for Json Property and for Json Array

IntroList.InfoIcon: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='height:60px' fill='none' viewBox='0 0 24 24' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='2' d='M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z' /></svg>
IntroList.InfoInfo: InProgress - Declarative Abstractions for Assembling Dynamic Data UI (Html + Json + Json) components using for Action Binding and for ViewID Generation

InProgress - No Special Abstractions identified tilldate for Assembling Realtime Data UI (Html + Json) components with Action (Json) Bindings since Component (Html/Json) changes in Backend are auto synced to Frontend
